snippet: This newest version of the Oreo draws on a marketing maneuver that industry insiders call “permission” to evoke the mere impression of cookie dough.
abstract: Michael Moss What's In It? column describes ingredients used in Cookie Dough Oreo, latest version of the popular sandwich cookie.
lead_paragraph: This newest version of the Oreo draws on a marketing maneuver that industry insiders call “permission” to evoke the mere impression of cookie dough.
